CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 31, 1958, pg. A16, reads: "'ICE CREAM MAN' - Leslie Uggams, 14-year-old 'Name that Tune' winner on TV, recently recorded 'The Ice Cream Man' on the Roulette label. When in Pittsburgh last week, she ran into Elmer Painter, a real ice cream man, who gave her a sample of his wares. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ice Cream man Elmer Painter handing wrapped ice cream bar to Leslie Uggams, in front of ice cream truck inscribed "Goodie Bar," Centre Avenue, Hill District
